# How to use battery

## create your app

```ts
import { Battery } from '@site/ui/Battery'
import { useBattery } from 'reev/react'

export const App = () => {
        const battery = useBattery()
        return <Battery level={battery?.level} charging={battery?.charging} />
}
```

import { Battery } from '@site/ui/Battery'
import { useBattery } from 'reev/react'

export const App = () => {
        const battery = useBattery()
        return <Battery level={battery?.level} charging={battery?.charging} />
}

<App />
